docs.text: now , lets first look into the history of shark films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the exciting jaws 2 . the rather flaky jaws 3d and sometime in the late 90s another film of the same genre that i can't seem to recall ( about the son of jaws returning to wreak revenge or something like that ) .

docs.text: now , with the magic of cgi , one shark is simply not enough ; in deep blue sea , there are 3 big , mean and really smart ones !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: russell frankiln ( jackson ) visits aquatica ( a sea-bound research center ) , where a research is being conducted on the extraction of a hormone substance found uniquely within the shark brain that can cure and reverse the effects of alzheimer's disease .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the substance is small in quantity and because of this , lead researcher dr . susan macalaester genetically alters the shark dna and grows them twice the size with brains as big as humans , naturally producing more of the much treasured hormones .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as sure as the sun sets in the west , a shark breaks lose and wreaks havoc within the facility during a hormone extraction procedure .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with the flexibility offered by cgi , the sharks get more full-length screen time as their predecessors did in those remote-controlled rubber suit days .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gone are the days of people getting pulled under the water with the water turning red right after .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this time , we get to see the entire gobbling action , with floating limbs and all .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so-so acting , expected in most of your average action film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: jackson ( fresh from his jedi master role in the phantom menace ) , takes on the dark-side force of a different kind and fits well with his wise-cracking lines .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ll cool j's cook role as preacher , does for this film what steven seagal's cook could only dream to achieve in his two under siege films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: deep blue sea does not offer any of the psychological thrills that jaws has to offer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it does however , prove to be a refreshing follow-up within the genre , full of visual thrills , suspense and believe it or not  humour !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: its like jurassic park under water .
